execution_plan.description: Retrieve all receipts with their associated customer IDs (exclude receipts with no customer).
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber, CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE CustomerId IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Get items for the receipts returned by step 1 (map receipts to bought items).
execution_plan.query: SELECT Receipt, Item FROM items WHERE Receipt IN ($step1.ReceiptNumber);

execution_plan.description: Get food type for each item id found in step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, food FROM goods WHERE id IN ($step2.Item);
